raw_body: Mr. ANIL ANOMAWANSA JAYAWARDENA – It is with profound sadness and grief that we inform the passing away of Mr. Anil Anomawansa Jayawardena,​ husband to Marialyn Sison Jayawardena,​ father to Jade & Ryan Jayawardena,​ brother of Anura Jayawardena,​ Pandula Jayawardena & Jayangani Dangadera,​ brother in law of Ranjani Jayawardena,​ Sonali Jayawardena & Anil Dangadera. Remains will lie at Jayaratne Funeral Directors on Elvitigala Mawatha from 3pm – 9pm on the 16th of November 2023 and on the 17th of November 2023 at 9am onwards with prayers at 10am,​ until cremation at 11.30am at the new Borella Crematorium.074967
